name: Don't drag me into this!
description: Makes pipes slightly less annoying.<LINE><LINE>- Corpses and prey can't drag you into pipes or dens. No more being eaten by baby centipedes.<LINE>- Creatures drop everything when dragged into a den. For example, when eaten by a pole mimic, scavengers drop their items and lizards drop their prey.<LINE><LINE>Art by Maedae#1029 at twitter.com/GarbageWastes<LINE>Code at github.com/Dual-Iron/barrel-of-scavs
